column1: \c[1]The Eastern army's attempt to achieve a quick victory over the West proved impossible.\! This battle has shifted the balance of power back into the West's favor.
column2: \c[1]El ejército del este fracasó en su intento de conseguir una victoria rápida contra el oeste.\! Esta batalla cambió el equilibrio de poder a favor del este.

column1: \c[1]The casualties are already mounting.\! Both sides are struggling to overcome public outcry, and rumblings of mutinies in their armies.\! Memories of the hardships of the Succession War are still fresh in people's minds.
column2: \c[1]Las bajas no hacen más que aumentar.\! Ambos bandos luchan para acallar las protestas públicas y los rumores de motines en sus ejércitos.\! Los recuerdos de las penurias que causó la Guerra de Sucesión siguen estando muy presentes.

column1:

[27] control.\! Casamir seems determined to take the throne at any cost.\! But how is Casamir one step ahead at every turn?
column2:

column1:
\c[1]
[8] is determined to confront Casamir directly, to get answers, and ultimately, to seek justice.\! It seems the only path is to win this war.\! So, 
[8] resolves to stay the course and lead 
[27] forces against the Eastern armies.\! It seems that the whims of war leaves 
[1] with little choice...
column2:
